name: Pancake Milkshake Merger
description:
Cupcake, Tiramisu, Macaron, Mousee, Crème Brûlée!

Looooooooovely desserts waiting for the Sweeeeeeeeeetheart

Merge the dessert that looks the same
Keep merging & merging and collecting & collecting
Will you be the sweetheart who firstly unlocks the most precious dessert?
